summary: My parents watching Good Omens
body:
My parents watching Good Omens

In the middle of episode 5

Mum: oh, so the demon and the angel are best friends?

Dad: …….. That’s the whole fucking point of the show. Have you been watching?

Mum: I just don’t like science shows, they bore me.

Dad: ……. HAVE YOU BEEN WATCHING THE SAME SHOW I HAVE???

reblog.comment:
My parents watching Good Omens

Dad: …….. That’s the whole fucking point of the show. Have you been watching?

Mum: I just don’t like science shows, they bore me.

Dad: ……. HAVE YOU BEEN WATCHING THE SAME SHOW I HAVE???

trail.content_raw:
My parents watching Good Omens

Dad: ……. HAVE YOU BEEN WATCHING THE SAME SHOW I HAVE???

blog.name: eternityunicorn
blog.title: An Elijah Mikaelson & Aziraphale Blog
blog.description:
Sadie|33|USA| I am writing an AU Vampire Diaries/Originals fanfic series called Elijah’s Eternity, with some Elijah x OC Eternity extras as a bonus. Also, I recently began a Good Omens project called The Mystery of Eternity featuring Aziraphale x OC Eternity. You can find my fics at Fanfictionnet: eternitysstories, Wattpad: eternityunicorn, and here: Masterlists to Fics.

I also have a fic challenge out here: Operation Challenge Me.

summary: Guys...
body:
Guys…

My blog might become an Elijah Mikaelson (The Originals) and an Aziraphale (Good Omens) space, meaning there might be some Aziraphale x OC Eternity fics to accompany my Elijah x OC Eternity ones. I haven’t decided yet, but it’s a possibility.

good omens fans are so confused
summary: Good Omens Fans:  “Oh yeah, I know what Michael Sheen looks like!  It’s this!” Twilight Fans:  “Um, yeah… I don’t know who that...
body:
Good Omens Fans:  “Oh yeah, I know what Michael Sheen looks like!  It’s this!”

Twilight Fans:  “Um, yeah… I don’t know who that guy is, because Michael Sheen looks like this.”

Underworld Fans: “That’s not Michael Sheen.  He’s this ripped beefcake sex god.”

The Rest of the World:  “Um, we don’t know who all those guys are, but we’re absolutely certain that Michael Sheen is that dude who looks like Tony Blair.”

reblog.comment:

The Rest of the World:  “Um, we don’t know who all those guys are, but we’re absolutely certain that Michael Sheen is that dude who looks like Tony Blair.”

The Rest of the World:  “Um, we don’t know who all those guys are, but we’re absolutely certain that Michael Sheen is that dude who looks like Tony Blair.”
trail.content:

Twilight Fans:  “Um, yeah… I don’t know who that guy is, because Michael Sheen looks like this.”

The Rest of the World:  “Um, we don’t know who all those guys are, but we’re absolutely certain that Michael Sheen is that dude who looks like Tony Blair.”

summary: i hate that michael’s played in like. horror movies. i hate those on principle bc 99% of the time they’re not well-executed and...
body:
i hate that michael’s played in like. horror movies. i hate those on principle bc 99% of the time they’re not well-executed and tend to demonize mentally ill people and use jump scares to achieve the required effect of, you know, scaring people. instead of literally anything else. so yeah anyway am i gonna watch apostle (2018)? probably not!

i am gonna watch twilight though.

tags: idk why that bothered me I always get very paranoid by ominous stuff and that last tweet he made was super sad and ominous
summary: Me: Man I’m kinda concerned about Michael Sheen after he tweeted that sad message over 2 days ago and hasn't tweeted since...
body:
Me: Man I’m kinda concerned about Michael Sheen after he tweeted that sad message over 2 days ago and hasn’t tweeted since then…

Michael Sheen:

Me: Not only am I glad you’re okay good sir, but I see you have even better taste than I already imagined. Please never change.
